references.paper_title: Multidiffusion: fusing diffusion paths for controlled image generation
references.reason: This paper introduces the MultiDiffusion framework, which SphereDiff extends to the spherical latent space, making it fundamental to SphereDiff's approach.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is important as it is a seminal work on Latent Diffusion Models (LDMs), which SphereDiff leverages for its image and video generation tasks.

references.paper_title: Sana: Efficient high-resolution image synthesis with linear diffusion transformers
references.reason: This paper represents the diffusion image generation, used as the backbone image generation model in SphereDiff, making it important for the experimental setup and comparison.
This paper introduces LTX-Video, a video diffusion model, used in SphereDiff, as a generation model making it integral to SphereDiff experiments.
This paper presents diffusion transformers making them significant as SphereDiff mentions it supports continuous 1D representations.
